text: After Biden's debate performance, the presidential race is unchanged  —  The race for the presidency remains statistically tied despite President Biden's dismal debate performance two weeks ago, a new national NPR/PBS NewsHour/Marist poll finds.  —  Biden actually gained a point since last month's survey …

Obama, Pelosi privately expressed concerns over Biden  —  Barack Obama and Nancy Pelosi have spoken privately about Joe Biden and the future of his 2024 campaign.  Both the former president and ex-speaker expressed concerns about how much harder they think it's become for the president to beat Donald Trump.

Behind the Curtain: Committee to Unelect the President … - Former Obama aides: The strained relationship between Obama and Biden extends to their former aides, including David Axelrod (Obama's ruthlessly pragmatic chief strategist) and the influential “Pod Save America” guys.

Biden heading to Michigan for rally after high-stakes news conference  —  The president heads to the must-win state after a mixed session with reporters that showcased his knowledge but also included verbal stumbles.  —  President Biden is set to hold a campaign rally in Michigan …

The Kremlin Is Angry at Biden's Remarks About Putin at NATO Summit  —  ‘IMPERMISSIBLE’  —  “We continue to consider it absolutely unacceptable and impermissible behavior for a head of state to make such disrespectful remarks about other heads of state,” the Kremlin said.

Playbook: Biden's presser leaves Dems in ‘purgatory’  —  With help from Eli Okun, Garrett Ross and Bethany Irvine  —  DRIVING THE DAY  —  GOOD MORNING, MR. PRESIDENT — “The race for the presidency remains statistically tied despite [President JOE] BIDEN's dismal debate performance two weeks ago …

Joe Biden Calls Kamala Harris ‘Vice President Trump’ at Crucial Press Conference  —  OH JOE  —  The president's make-or-break press conference started with a mix-up after he called Ukrainian President Zelensky “Putin.”  —  Deputy Washington Bureau Chief  —  Joe Biden started …

Biden does some damage control with House Dems — but not enough  —  President Joe Biden delivered a steady performance at a high-stakes press conference Thursday but still fell short of assuring jittery Democrats concerned about his future, prolonging painful questions across the party.

'It's Like Being Liberated': Republicans Bask in the Glow of a Democratic Meltdown  —  After years of answering for their own party's dysfunction, GOP lawmakers are delighted to watch Democrats squirm over what to do about Joe Biden.  —  House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) at the U.S. Capitol on Tuesday.

Trump allies view Biden's press conference as ‘best of both worlds’  —  They say Biden performed well enough to stave off calls to drop out but managed to provide campaign ad fodder.  —  Former President Donald Trump's advisers and allies viewed President Joe Biden's press conference …

GOP Rep Delivers a House Floor Speech Straight Out of 'The Handmaid's Tale'  —  BLESSED BE THE FRUIT  —  In a speech before the House that seemed lifted right out of Margaret Atwood's dystopian classic, Rep. Glenn Grothman said he wants the U.S. to go back to 1960.

July 11, 2024  —  Yesterday, Raw Story reported that Ivan Raiklin, Trump's self-declared “Secretary of Retribution” has compiled a “Deep State target list” of 350 people he wants to see arrested and punished for “treason” if Trump is reelected.  The list includes Democratic and Republican elected officials …

Where are the Radical Republicans when we need them?  —  America once understood the necessity of uniting against existential threats. … History teaches a clear lesson: When a nation's democratic institutions are facing an existential threat, relentlessly opposing it should be the sole focus.

AOC understands the stakes: The “high crimes” of Clarence Thomas and Sam Alito must be prosecuted  —  The corruption of Supreme Court justices is about more than greed.  It “constitutes a clear danger to our democracy”  —  Corruption is one of those issues that tends to rile …

Trump May Attempt to Disavow Project 2025 — but He's not Disavowing Viktor Orbán  —  The press has been a bit befuddled by Trump's repeated attempts to disavow Project 2025.  —  One of the best debunkings of Trump's false disavowal came from CNN, which made a list of the 140 Trump associates involved in Project 2025.
